page.title: 14FARMING (cont)
page.content: Most farmers grow potatoes around here,and the potatoes are sent to Manchester. Some farmers grow bulbs, like daffodils, and they send the bulbs all over the country to be sold on the markets and in the shops.The daffodils come out about April,and many visitors come to see the fields full of beautiful yellow flowers.Some fields are full of rose bushes,which are sold in garden centres. Farmers used to use Shire horses for farm work, as we use machinery nowadays.Some people keep Shire horses for a hobby and to exhibit at agricultural shows. There are quite a lot of smallholdings which grow horticultural produce such as lettuce,tomatoes, cabbage and onions.
